cinematics.title: The Shattered Aegis
cinematics.text:
For centuries, the Aegis has stood as a silent guardian, a barrier of pure resonance shielding our world from the void. But now, the song of protection falters.

Deep beneath the peaceful village of Hearthwell, an ancient enemy stirsâ€”the Echo Primordial. The earth trembles, and crystalline corruption bleeds from the depths.

As the shadows lengthen, a new hero must rise to restore the harmony before the silence takes us all.

cinematics.title: The Discordant Wilds
cinematics.text:
Hearthwell is safe, but the victory is fleeting. The tremors have ceased only to be replaced by a discordant hum rising from the wilderness.

The corruption has breached the town's borders, twisting the ancient forests into a nightmare of crystal and shadow. Captain Thorne reports strange energies pulsing from the ruins to the east.

The first shard was but a key; now you must venture into the unknown to find the lock. The Echo is listening... and it knows you are coming.
